{{Infobox Radio station |image =| |name = ABC Far North| |callsign = 4QCC| |coordinates = {{Coord|16|55|00.83|S|145|46|04.71|E|type:landmark_scale:2000_region:AU}} |airdate = 20 January 1950 | |frequency = 106.7 [[Megahertz|mHz]] [[frequency modulation|FM]] Cairns
and others as listed| |area = [[Far North Queensland]]| |owner = [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation]] | |format = [[Talk radio|Talk]] | |website = [http://www.abc.net.au/farnorth/ http://www.abc.net.au/farnorth/] | }} '''ABC Far North''' is an [[ABC Local Radio]] station based in [[Cairns, Queensland|Cairns]]. The station broadcasts to [[Far North Queensland]]. This includes the towns of [[Cooktown, Queensland|Cooktown]], [[Mossman, Queensland|Mossman]], [[Innisfail, Queensland|Innisfail]], [[Weipa, Queensland|Weipa]] and up to the [[Torres Strait Islands]]. The station began broadcasting as '''4QY''' in [[1950]], although the '''4AT''' transmitter opened earlier in [[1941]]. It was originally a relay of the national program. Studios were then built and local programs began on 4 October 1952. Along with over 20 low power FM transmitters, the station broadcasts through the following main [[FM Broadcasting|FM]] and [[AM Broadcasting|AM]] transmitters: *'''4QCC''' 106.7 FM *'''4QCC/T''' 105.7 FM *'''4QCC/T''' 95.5 FM *'''4MS''' 639 AM *'''4AT''' 720 AM *'''4QY''' 801 AM *'''4WP''' 1044 AM *'''4TI''' 1062 AM ==Local Programs== ===Weekdays=== *Breakfast with Kier Shorey â 5:00 AM to 8:00 AM *Mornings with Fiona Sewell â 8:30 AM to 11:00 AM *Drive with Richard Dinnen â 4:00 PM to 6:00 PM ===Saturday=== *Saturday Breakfast with Sharon Molly â 6:00 AM to 9:00 AM *Far Northern Grandstand with Bluey Forsyth â 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM When local programs are not broadcast the station is a relay of [[ABC Capricornia]] and [[612 ABC Brisbane]]. ==References== {{cite web |title=ABC Far North station history |url= http://www.abc.net.au/local/stories/2008/04/28/2228953.htm?site=farnorth |date=2008-05-02 |accessdate=2008-05-02 |publisher=[[ABC Online]] }} ==See also== * [[List of Australian radio stations]] {{ABC Local Radio}} [[Category:Radio stations in Queensland]] {{DEFAULTSORT:Abc Far North}}
